name: base-koa-sls-api
description: base koa serverless application to model future apis from

scripts.lint-container: docker-compose run koa-sls npm run lint
scripts.offline: npm run build && SLS_OFFLINE=true sls offline start
scripts.test: npm run build-test && STAGE=test nyc -r lcov -r text -r html --report-dir ./docs/coverage --exclude 'dist_test/test/**/*.js' ava './dist_test/test/**/*.js' -T 300000 -c 10
